item.title: AlexCTF Re2 : C++ is fun: [100]
item.description: So you get a binary when running it you get a message to enter the flag. When entering somthing wrong it tells you to try again. However, since I know that the flag starts with “ALEXCTF{” I trief that and got the message “You should have the flag by now” then I thought that the original code might look somthing like this #include <stdio.h>#include <string.h>using namespace std; int main () { string flag=".
